definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
tenon (wooden projection to fit into a mortise)
mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)
mortise and tenon (slot and tab forming a carpenter's joint)

sentences.english: Finish all the eight tenons of the four sides, and the front cover will be done.
sentences.chinese: 依序完成每一四邊共八個卡榫，前蓋完成。

sentences.english: This paper studies Wood Tenoner Modeling and Computer-aided manufacturing about numerical control tenon process.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究實木榫建模與數控開榫計算機輔助製造技術。

sentences.english: This paper studies Wood Tenoner Modeling and Computer-aided manufacturing about numerical control tenon process.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究實木榫建模與數控開榫計算機輔助製造技術。

sentences.english: Join by a tenon and mortise.
sentences.chinese: 通過榫和榫眼而連接在一起。

sentences.english: The combination of the frame parts should basically be made by wood dowel attachment or by tenons and glue.
sentences.chinese: 框架部分的連接處應該以木釘或者木榫膠水等方式。

sentences.english: Tune in to get a great technique for cutting the tenons and dovetails on the bandsaw.
sentences.chinese: 調來取得了偉大的榫切割技術和帶鋸相吻合。

sentences.english: The engine is cogged to the wheels by the transmission.
sentences.chinese: 這個引擎經傳動裝置被卡榫到輪子。

sentences.english: Death and life are neatly dovetailed by the supreme cabinetmaker of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 演化的最高的細木工整齊用鳩尾榫接合死和生命。

sentences.english: Once all the holes are bored, square the ends and the sides of the mortise with a chisel (Photo 15).
sentences.chinese: 所有孔打完後，用鑿刀將榫孔邊修方正。

sentences.english: But be careful while removing to avoid the break of tenon.
sentences.chinese: 不過拆卸時請小心，避免卡榫斷裂。

sentences.english: The tongue can be S-shaped to form an interlocking relationship with the groove.
sentences.chinese: 榫舌可呈S形以與凹槽形成互鎖關係。

sentences.english: Rosewood furniture is made by tenons, not nails.
sentences.chinese: 紅木傢俱的製作是用入榫方法，不用釘子。

sentences.english: Besides, we bought a power mortise chisel and an electric drill of the latest model as well.
sentences.chinese: 另外我們還買了一架電動榫鑿和一個最新式的電鑽。

sentences.english: I suppose the environmental way would be to use tongue-in-groove lumber.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺有榫舌和凹槽的木材纔是環保的。

sentences.english: You can also buy readymade dowels from mail-order suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以買現成的圓木榫。

sentences.english: The anti-sliding function of tenon and its design theory were introduced in connection with a practical project.
sentences.chinese: 結合工程實際，介紹凸榫的防滑機理及設計理論。

definition: mortise and tenon (slot and tab forming a carpenter's joint)
mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
tenon (wooden projection to fit into a mortise)
a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
to form a seam/to join up
